title: ChatGPT is finally adding Download as PDF for Deep Research
summary: ChatGPT's Deep Research, which allows you to conduct multi-step research for complex tasks, is finally getting an option to save the report as a PDF. [...]

title: iClicker hack targeted students with malware via fake CAPTCHA
summary: The website of iClicker, a popular student engagement platform, was compromised in a ClickFix attack that used a fake CAPTCHA prompt to trick students and instructors into installing malware on their devices. [...]
